definitions.definition: A household or commercial appliance used for keeping food fresh by refrigeration ( short form fridge ).
A similar device used to keep non-food items cold, such as blood, photographic film, drugs, or pharmaceuticals like insulin.
One who has a chilling influence.

main_definition: A household or commercial appliance used for keeping food fresh by refrigeration ( short form fridge ).
secondary_definitions: A similar device used to keep non-food items cold, such as blood, photographic film, drugs, or pharmaceuticals like insulin.
One who has a chilling influence.
